Package fr.univ.lille1.ftp.server.request.control

This package contains all the classes for the ftp requests which can perform control commands on the connection

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    FtpCdupRequest
    FtpCdupRequest is the class associated to the CDUP ftp request CDUP allows the user to go up in the current file system
    FtpCwdRequest
    FtpCwdRequest is the class associated to the CDW ftp request CDW allows the user to change his current directory on the ftp server
    FtpMkdRequest
    FtpMkdRequest is the class associated to the (X)MKD ftp request (X)MKD allows the user to create a new directory on the ftp server
    FtpPassRequest
    FtpPassRequest is the class associated to the PASS ftp request PASS allows the user to send the password associated to his ftp account on the server
    FtpPasvRequest
    FtpPasvRequest is the class associated to the PASV ftp request PASV allows the user client to put the connection into passive mode In the passive mode, the client initiates the data connection to the server
    FtpPortRequest
    FtpPortRequest is the class associated to the PASV ftp request PASV allows the user client to put the connection into passive mode In the passive mode, the client initiates the data connection to the server
    FtpPwdRequest
    FtpPwdRequest is the class associated to the PWD ftp request PWD allows the user client to print his current directory on the ftp server
    FtpQuitRequest
    FtpQuitRequest is the class associated to the QUIT ftp request QUIT allows the user client to close the ftp control connection
    FtpRmdRequest
    FtpRmdRequest is the class associated to the (X)RMD ftp request (X)RMD allows the user to delete a directory on the ftp server
    FtpTypeRequest
    FtpTypeRequest is the class associated to the TYPE ftp request TYPE allows the user to change the data transfer mode between ASCII (A) or BINARY (I)
    FtpUserRequest
    FtpUserRequest is the class associated to the USER ftp request USER allows the user to identify himself on the ftp server with a username

Package fr.univ.lille1.ftp.server.request.control Description

This package contains all the classes for the ftp requests which can perform control commands on the connection
Version:
1.0
Author:
Quentin Warnant
